name: Lufthansa Airbus A380-841 [D-AIMG] Dawn Landing in Frankfurt ᴴᴰ
description:
Here is my very first flight on the Superjumbo arriving in Frankfurt, after a very pleasant 10 hour flight from Houston. The service onboard was outstanding, surprisingly so for economy class, and I would definitely fly Lufthansa again. On short final, I included a picture in picture view of the tail camera on my inflight entertainment screen, which was a very cool feature of the A380 that I enjoyed very much. I hope you'll enjoy the video, and stay tuned for a lot more to come!

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
____________________________________________________

FLIGHT INFO
Airline: Lufthansa (DLH/LH)
Aircraft: Airbus A380-800
Aircraft Name: "Wien"
Engines: 4x RR Trent 970
Seat: 58A
Registration: D-AIMG
Route: IAH-FRA
Callsign: Lufthansa 441 Super
Runway used: 25L
Taxiway(s) used: M23, M30, L, N8
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/DAIMG
____________________________________________________

VIDEO LOG
00:12 - View of the wing, just after sunset.
00:19 - Some gorgeous lighting on the engines during sunrise.
00:25 - Banking towards our approach path
00:47 - Turning onto approach for Runway 25L
03:56 - Picture-in-picture video of IFE screen begins
04:25 - On final now, passing over the A5 Motorway
04:45 - Touchdown!
04:58 - Picture-in-picture video of tail camera ends
05:40 - Exiting the runway, onto Taxiway M23
07:35 - Crossing runway 25C/07C
08:15 - Turning onto Taxiway Lima, several aircraft on remote stands visible
08:33 - Several Lufthansa Cargo MD-11Fs and 777Fs visible
09:10 - Taxiing past a Lufthansa A330 and A340, towering over them
10:10 - Lufthansa Technik Hangar visible, with an Iraqi Airways 747 on the ramp
13:40 - Taxiing into our gate
14:05 - Final stop
____________________________________________________
